name: A daily dose of ANXIETY!
description:
REMEMBER. YOUR CHOICES MATTER.

IT'S A DEMO VERSION OF GAME.

You meet 17 years old boy who is struggling with horrible anxiety.
Tobias is a very talented artist, coming from not-very-rich family
his parents don't really care about him after he told them about his problems.
He tried many times to show people how he really feels.
No one cared anyway.
He was born as a failure.It's not his fault, isn't it?

Main updates are going to be uploaded on my Twitter! \/

Stranger (@5tr4ngr) / Twitter 

Stay tuned for more projects in the future!

See you somwhere there, Dreamer.
